Choose One?

November 22, 2019

When I was eleven, I was at a youth program when a family friend came up to me. I remember he smiled and asked, “Are you a math and science person, or a history and English person?” I looked at him like a deer in headlights. I didn’t know how to answer. Though the question was merely small talk, it stuck with me. Could I be both? Neither? In many… Read more
